answers.author: Doreen Kemp
answers.text:
The City of Fort Collins uses the Talent/Rewards system from Towers/Watson.  Talent/Rewards is an integrated talent management system and the Performance Management Process is just one component of the system.  The components of the system takes into consideration the life-cycle of the employee i.e., from hire to retire.  If you want a contact person at Towers/Watson, please contact the Human Resources Director, Janet Miller at jamiller@fcgov.com or 970-221-6826.
